name: Beat.Pitch.Mayhem
description: In the world of Beat Pitch Mayhem, the resident DJ of Club Vortex - Digital Jynx - has been forcibly removed from his booth, and the evil monster Malkior has taken over. Through his mysterious audio abilities, Malkior has summoned monsters all throughout the club and placed the dancers in a trancelike, immobile state. Due to the source of the power pulling these monsters into our world, each monster type emits a unique sound that matches various parts of the music in the club. Through careful and stealthy navigation through the high-energy surroundings, and the help of a few gadgets picked up along the way, DJ must reach his DJ Booth and get rid of Malkior!
